Info.Description: Parameter for the DDR3 memory from Alliance memory AS4C512M16D3L-12 on the Hilscher NXHX 4000 JTAG+ R3 board at 600MHz with activated ECC. netX4000 (FULL) is used

HBootSnippet.Snippet:
<Options> <Option id="ddr"> <U32>10000</U32> <!-- The number of ticks to wait for the power up. --> <DDR> <!-- Configure the DDR control registers. --> <WriteCtrl register="0" data="0x00000600"/> <!-- register 1 is read only and therefore here not included --> <WriteCtrl register="2" data="0x00000006"/> <!-- registers 3 - 5 are read only and therefore here not included --> <WriteCtrl register="6" data="0x0001d4a9"/> <WriteCtrl register="7" data="0x000493a5"/> <WriteCtrl register="8" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="9" data="0x12000200"/> <WriteCtrl register="10" data="0x04040007"/> <WriteCtrl register="11" data="0x05151e05"/> <WriteCtrl register="12" data="0x04051809"/> <WriteCtrl register="13" data="0x00a47f0c"/> <WriteCtrl register="14" data="0x09000503"/> <WriteCtrl register="15" data="0x01000009"/> <WriteCtrl register="16" data="0x09031301"/> <WriteCtrl register="17" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="18" data="0x00010000"/> <WriteCtrl register="19" data="0x123f00d2"/> <!-- register 20 is read only and therefore here not included --> <WriteCtrl register="21" data="0x000f0004"/> <WriteCtrl register="22" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="23" data="0x00d80200"/> <WriteCtrl register="24" data="0x00010000"/> <WriteCtrl register="25" data="0x00060600"/> <WriteCtrl register="26" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="27" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="28" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="29" data="0x00000000"/> <!-- registers 30 - 31 are read only and therefore here not included --> <WriteCtrl register="32" data="0x00460a50"/> <WriteCtrl register="33" data="0x00000010"/> <WriteCtrl register="34" data="0x00000000"/> <!-- registers 35 - 38 are read only and therefore here not included --> <WriteCtrl register="39" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="40" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="41" data="0x00000000"/> <!-- registers 42 - 48 are read only and therefore here not included --> <WriteCtrl register="49" data="0x01000200"/> <WriteCtrl register="50" data="0x02000040"/> <WriteCtrl register="51" data="0x00000040"/> <!-- register 52 is read only and therefore here not included --> <WriteCtrl register="53" data="0x01000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="54" data="0x01ffff0a"/> <WriteCtrl register="55" data="0x01010101"/> <WriteCtrl register="56" data="0x01000001"/> <WriteCtrl register="57" data="0x00000103"/> <WriteCtrl register="58" data="0x00000c00"/> <WriteCtrl register="59" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="60" data="0x00000001"/> <!-- registers 61 - 69 are read only and therefore here not included --> <WriteCtrl register="70" data="0x01000606"/> <!-- registers 71 - 72 are read only and therefore here not included --> <WriteCtrl register="73" data="0x00000400"/> <WriteCtrl register="74" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="75" data="0x00000000"/> <!-- registers 76 - 77 are read only and therefore here not included --> <WriteCtrl register="78" data="0x280d0000"/> <WriteCtrl register="79" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="80" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="81" data="0x00010001"/> <WriteCtrl register="82" data="0x00010001"/> <WriteCtrl register="83" data="0x00000001"/> <WriteCtrl register="84" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="85" data="0x00000000"/> <!-- register 86 is read only and therefore here not included --> <WriteCtrl register="87" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="88" data="0x00012222"/> <!-- register 89 is read only and therefore here not included --> <WriteCtrl register="90" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="91" data="0x00222200"/> <WriteCtrl register="92" data="0x00000001"/> <!-- register 93 is read only and therefore here not included --> <WriteCtrl register="94" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="95" data="0x00012222"/> <!-- register 96 is read only and therefore here not included --> <WriteCtrl register="97" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="98" data="0x00222200"/> <WriteCtrl register="99" data="0x00000001"/> <!-- register 100 is read only and therefore here not included --> <WriteCtrl register="101" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="102" data="0x00012222"/> <WriteCtrl register="103" data="0x01020201"/> <WriteCtrl register="104" data="0x02010202"/> <WriteCtrl register="105" data="0x02020102"/> <WriteCtrl register="106" data="0x00020201"/> <WriteCtrl register="107" data="0x05050000"/> <WriteCtrl register="108" data="0x00000505"/> <WriteCtrl register="109" data="0x04040064"/> <WriteCtrl register="110" data="0x00010404"/> <WriteCtrl register="111" data="0x03030064"/> <WriteCtrl register="112" data="0x00020303"/> <WriteCtrl register="113" data="0x02020064"/> <WriteCtrl register="114" data="0x00030202"/> <WriteCtrl register="115" data="0x01010064"/> <WriteCtrl register="116" data="0x00040101"/> <WriteCtrl register="117" data="0x00000064"/> <WriteCtrl register="118" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="119" data="0x00001A00"/> <WriteCtrl register="120" data="0x00247e05"/> <WriteCtrl register="121" data="0x02000200"/> <WriteCtrl register="122" data="0x02000200"/> <WriteCtrl register="123" data="0x0000247e"/> <WriteCtrl register="124" data="0x00016cec"/> <WriteCtrl register="125" data="0x0 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_CTRL_CTL125_TDFI_DRAM_CLK_DISABLE | 0x2 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_CTRL_CTL125_TDFI_CTRL_DELAY | 0x08 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_CTRL_CTL125_WRLAT_ADJ | 0x08 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_CTRL_CTL125_RDLAT_ADJ"/> <WriteCtrl register="126" data="0x000a0a05"/> <WriteCtrl register="127" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="128" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="129" data="0x04038000"/> <WriteCtrl register="130" data="0x07060a07"/> <WriteCtrl register="131" data="0x00ffff24"/> <WriteCtrl register="132" data="0x000f0010"/> <WriteCtrl register="133" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="134" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="135" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="136" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="137" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="138" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="139" data="0x00000204"/> <!-- register 140 is read only and therefore here not included --> <WriteCtrl register="141" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="142" data="0x00000001"/> <!-- registers 143 - 149 are read only and therefore here not included --> <WriteCtrl register="150" data="0x01000000"/> <!-- register 151 is read only and therefore here not included --> <WriteCtrl register="152" data="0x1 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_CTRL_CTL152_ECC_EN"/> <WriteCtrl register="153" data="0x03e80010"/> <WriteCtrl register="154" data="0x00000064"/> <WriteCtrl register="155" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="156" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="157" data="0x01000000"/> <!-- register 158 is read only and therefore here not included --> <WriteCtrl register="159" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="160" data="0x2000000 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_CTRL_CTL160_INT_MASK"/> <WriteCtrl register="161" data="0x00000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="162" data="0x00000000"/>
<!-- IF voltage and software reset release. --> <WritePhy register="0" data="(0x1 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_FUNCCTRL_IFSEL) | MSK_NX4000_DDR_PHY_FUNCCTRL_FUNCRSTB"/>
<!-- DLL control mode setting. SDLY control from MDLL, self-reset mode, normal mode, SRCLK/HRCLK frequency range setting and MDLL standby. --> <WritePhy register="1" data="(0x1 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_DLLCTRL_MFSL)"/>
<!-- Initialize the FIFOs. --> <WritePhy register="6" data="MSK_NX4000_DDR_PHY_FIFOINIT_RDPTINITEXE | MSK_NX4000_DDR_PHY_FIFOINIT_WRPTINITEXE"/>
<!-- ZQ calibration setting. DFICLK frequency range setting, calibration execution intervals setting, mode settings, beginning value settings and ZQ calibration resets. --> <WritePhy register="2" data="(0x1 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQCALCTRL_ZQCALUPD) | (0x1 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQCALCTRL_ZQCALFREQ) | (0x7 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQCALCTRL_ZQCALITVL) | MSK_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQCALCTRL_ZQCALMODE | MSK_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQCALCTRL_ZQCALSTRV"/>
<!-- Delay for 100us or more. --> <Delay ticks="2000"/>
<!-- Command/Address output phase setting, I/F FIFO mode setting, I/F FIFO read pointer value setting, driver impedance setting, slew rate setting, ODT use/unuse setting, DNV mode setting and DRAM I/F setting. --> <WritePhy register="3" data="(0x3 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQODTCTRL_CAPHASE) | MSK_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQODTCTRL_WRFIFOEN | (0x1 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQODTCTRL_FIFORPINIT) | (0x5 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQODTCTRL_ZQDATA) | (0x5 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQODTCTRL_ZQCK) | (0x5 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQODTCTRL_ZQCMDAD) | (0x2 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQODTCTRL_PHYODT) | MSK_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQODTCTRL_PHYODTEN | (0x1 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQODTCTRL_DRAMIF)"/>
<!-- Delay for 200us or more. --> <Delay ticks="4000"/>
<!-- ODT timing setting, BEN (receiver bias enable) timing setting and IEN (receiver input enable) timing setting. --> <WritePhy register="4" data="(0xe << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_RDCTRL_PHYODTONT) | (0x7 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_RDCTRL_PHYODTOFT) | (0x4 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_RDCTRL_PDQODTONT) | (0x7 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_RDCTRL_PDQODTOFT) | (0xe << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_RDCTRL_PHYBENONT) | (0x7 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_RDCTRL_PHYBENOFT) | (0x4 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_RDCTRL_PHYIENONT) | (0x2 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_RDCTRL_PHYIENOFT)"/>
<!-- Read reclocking timing setting, command and DQ output mode setting. --> <WritePhy register="5" data="MSK_NX4000_DDR_PHY_RDTMG_RDMODE | (0xb << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_RDTMG_RDENVALID) | (0x2 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_RDTMG_WDOMODE)"/>
<!-- BL/RL/WL setting, output setting at DFIDATABYTEDISABLE mode, MRESETB output enable settings, MCKE, MODT output enable setting, address and command output enable setting. --> <WritePhy register="7" data="(0x7 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_OUTCTRL_CKOBUFEN) | (0x2 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_OUTCTRL_MBL) | (0x9 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_OUTCTRL_MRL) | (0x7 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_OUTCTRL_MWL) | MSK_NX4000_DDR_PHY_OUTCTRL_RESETBOE | MSK_NX4000_DDR_PHY_OUTCTRL_CKEODTOE | MSK_NX4000_DDR_PHY_OUTCTRL_ADCMDOE"/>
<!-- Release the reset. --> <WritePhy register="2" data="(0x1 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQCALCTRL_ZQCALUPD) | (0x1 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQCALCTRL_ZQCALFREQ) | (0x7 << SRT_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQCALCTRL_ZQCALITVL) | MSK_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQCALCTRL_ZQCALMODE | MSK_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQCALCTRL_ZQCALSTRV | MSK_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQCALCTRL_ZQCALRSTB"/>
<!-- Wait for calibration done. --> <PollPhy register="2" mask="MSK_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQCALCTRL_ZQCALEND" data="MSK_NX4000_DDR_PHY_ZQCALCTRL_ZQCALEND" ticks="1000000"/>
<!-- Delay for 500us or more. --> <Delay ticks="10000"/>
<!-- Start the netX 4000 (FULL) DDR controller. --> <WriteCtrl register="0" data="0x00000600 | MSK_NX4000_DDR_CTRL_CTL0_START"/> <PollCtrl register="158" mask="0x800" data="0x800" ticks="1000000"/> <WriteCtrl register="159" data="0x800"/> </DDR> </Option> </Options>
